publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2671 Roseanna Cunningham: Perth Bid for New SNH Headquarters-That the Parliament recognises that Scottish Natural Heritage intends to move its headquarters out of Edinburgh; notes previous commitments by the Scottish Executive on the dispersion of civil service and other public sector jobs, and welcomes the submission from Perth and Kinross Council highlighting the suitability of a number of sites in Perthshire. Supported by: Mr John Swinney*

S1M-2671 Roseanna Cunningham: Perth Bid for New SNH Headquarters-That the Parliament recognises that Scottish Natural Heritage intends to move its headquarters out of Edinburgh; notes previous commitments by the Scottish Executive on the dispersion of civil service and other public sector jobs, and welcomes the submission from Perth and Kinross Council highlighting the suitability of a number of sites in Perthshire. Supported by: Mr John Swinney
S1M-2671 Perth Bid for New SNH Headquarters (lodged on 31 January 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2671 Perth Bid for New SNH Headquarters (lodged on 31 January 2002) Murdo Fraser*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2671 Perth Bid for New SNH Headquarters (lodged on 31 January 2002) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2671 Perth Bid for New SNH Headquarters (lodged on 31 January 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2671 Perth Bid for New SNH Headquarters (lodged on 31 January 2002) Robin Harper*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-2671 Perth Bid for New SNH Headquarters (lodged on 31 January 2002) Tricia Marwick*
